name: Tower Of PewTen
description:
New Mexico Game Jam, the theme is ten.  We decided to create a game named Putin’s Tower. Our game is a 2.5D PC Beat Em’ Up Side-Scroller game compared to something like Scott pilgrim vs the world where you progress through different levels and in order to progress you need to defeat multiple enemies to advance to the next floor. You are tasked with fighting your way to the top of the building in order to become the boss and get the best possible position in the company.
